NEW SERVICE FOR SUPPLY TEACHERS AND AGENCY STAFF GOES LIVE
With effect from Monday 4th September 2006, Carlisle Managed Solutions (CMS) is the new contracted neutral vendor service for all supply teachers and agency staff.

As a Neutral Vendor CMS offers a solution that differs from other solutions in that we act as an intermediary between suppliers and schools and do not supply staff directly. This allows us to negotiate rates and contract services on your behalf with terms and conditions defined by the requirements of the local authority.
Carlisle Managed Solution is a recruitment-outsourcing specialist and is cited in the OPDM report on Delivery Efficiencies in Local Services as an example of best practice.
column2: As a neutral vendor CMS does not supply staff directly, but contracts with, manages and audits all temporary recruitment agencies on behalf of the Authority, acting as an intermediary between suppliers and schools.

column1: As a school using this service you can be assured of the following:
• Service covered by a robust service level agreement endorsed by the council's Management Team.
• A team to take your call 24 hours a day 7 days a week.
• A central point of contact to a dedicated Brighton based account team.
• A safer temporary recruitment process - CMS will ensure all supply staff will be fully screened and safety vetted in line with DfES and legislative guidelines.
• Cost and time efficiencies - CMS will closely control pricing and receive canvass calls from non-contracted suppliers to save you time.
• Quality control - CMS will work to re-deploy good quality temporary workers and will actively seek feedback to ensure satisfaction with the service.
• Quality reviews - CMS will offer face-to-face meetings to build effective working relationships and gain greater understanding of your requirements.
• Extensive management information by term, for each individual school.
How to book a Supply Teacher or Agency Staff
There are two options to choose from when requesting a Supply Teacher or Agency Staff:
1) Call the dedicated Education Consultant to discuss your requirements on 01273 296 534
2) Book a temp online, by accessing the online requisition form via the following link: https://bhcc.evolution-system.com/requirements/bhccform.asp
Should you require further instruction when using the form, please contact CMS on 01273 296 534 who will be happy to assist.
Once you notify CMS of a requirement either via the phone or online, the Education Consultant will begin the process of sourcing a candidate for you that match your requirements.
column2: CMS will work with a number of agencies to source the right candidate via a contract that requires them to work to specific levels of quality and cost margins.&nbsp

column1: Once the candidate has been selected, CMS will ensure that all staff background checks and specific legislative requirements have been undertaken prior to them starting the booking to ensure a safer recruitment process for you.
